Reviews.Title: Looks and feels good but 3 out of 5 had shorts
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 of these and 2 200 footers.  Nice thick cable however I don't know if I got a bad batch or what.  One 200 foot didn't work at all.  2 of the 3 100 foot cables will loose video if I move the cable.  They are loosing contact somewhere where the cable splits the power and bnc.  Amazon replaced the 200 foot and it works fine now.  I don't want to run any more cable and the other work ok as long as we don't move the cables.

Reviews.Title: Q-See RG-59 Cable
Reviews.Author: T. Sullivan "PC Guy"
Reviews.Content: This is the cable that should come with all their CCTV units instead of the really cheap stuff they ship.  This is tough and can be pulled without worrying that it will break.  The extra shielding helps in case you have to run over an electrical wires (no interference).  Highly recommend over the cheap stuff they ship with the package units.  This had both the CCTV lead and the power lead, so it's a direct replacement for their other cables.  It's 100ft long vs. the 60ft cable they package, when you need that little extra distance.  They say to use a bigger power supply for the longer runs, but I have tried both with an issue.  It maybe a problem if you have mostly long runs, but with just two an split one on each supply and didn't see a problem.  FYI the reg PSU is 3amp and bigger is 5amp.

Reviews.Title: fixed noise issues
Reviews.Author: kevin barker
Reviews.Content: have these going into safe through two 90 degree angles through door, the original cables that came with SWANN system had bunch of noise, these work perfectly. highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Decent cable with a couple of issues
Reviews.Author: She-Ra
Reviews.Content: The quality of the connectors are below the ones that came with my Lorex system.  The cables work, but I am a little worried about the long term performance.  Also, not shown in the picture, is that about 8 inches below the connectors is a rectangular stress relief feature molded onto the cable.  This prevents you from splitting the cable more than 8 inches, and also requires a larger hole to be drilled in the wall to pass through the cable.  In order to make do with a smaller hole I trimmed the relief block with a utility knife.

Reviews.Title: Really good cable
Reviews.Author: Ryan Peterson
Reviews.Content: More wire than I had originally thought I needed, but it worked out well. The cables are really thick ( at least 10x thicker than the cables that came with the camera system ).

Reviews.Title: Quality cable
Reviews.Author: MaryL
Reviews.Content: Good quality cable and works very well with camera.  Very clear picture. Well shielded and doesn't seem to allow any inference

Reviews.Title: Good price, worked great!
Reviews.Author: Gpujic
Reviews.Content: In my personal experience the cable worked very well without problems. The length made it easy to customize my entire system (I installed this at a local academy school).

Reviews.Title: Nice heavy duy cables
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Much heavier cable than the original ones I got. A very good product. Video quality is very good. Will buy these as I add more cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great - Really thick wire
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: I am  not having any problems with this wire. It works great with my cameras.Note: This wire is very thick because of double shielded therefore it will require lot of space. If your application does not require lot of current carried around I really recommend buying LTS wires. Those wire are similar to these ones however they look thinn but they are sturdy. I think I own 7-8 of those.

Reviews.Title: shielded cab le
Reviews.Author: Vincent Riley
Reviews.Content: do what it suppose to do, no problems. it is shielded cable I do not have any signal problems it is great. I would remmended it to any one looking for a good shielded cable.

Reviews.Title: Q_See  good quality
Reviews.Author: whiskers
Reviews.Content: Bought 4 of these on Amazon  for 4 cameras  .seem to be very good quality. Only problem was that when 4 were selected on Amazon it reduced the order saying quantities were limited  As a result some of the order was duplicated  resulting in some cable connectors being double ordered and shipping to return was as much as the value of the connectors .  Bad move limiting to only 3 per order  . causing two orders to be placed  on two accounts

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Rodeman
Reviews.Content: This is a great products.  I returned the off brand ones because they were not shielded.  These removed all the horizontal scrolling issue as soon as I plugged them in.  Stick with Q-see and stay away from the knock-off brands.

Reviews.Title: Check the cable before installing!
Reviews.Author: parent
Reviews.Content: I saw on a review of this cable on another site that the cable was faulty. I bought two and installed them both. After getting no feed I switched out the cameras with one I knew worked and it turns out the cable was faulty. The other cable I bought works fine. I just wish I'd have tested them both before fishing the cable int place. Amazon's return policy is great though.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Toyo
Reviews.Content: These are a lot better than the cables that were included with the cameras. As everyone else states, the shielding is thick and does it's job.  All the parts were included and it works!

Reviews.Title: Much better than the standard cables in the box
Reviews.Author: F. Cirksena "fcirkse"
Reviews.Content: I ordered these cables and another set by mistake from another store and was very surprised at how much better constructed this one was than both the other set and the one that came with the Q-See system.  I needed 100' to be strung around the side of my house and tucked away under the siding so it didn't show so I wanted a strong cable with lots of insulation.  This set fit the bill perfectly and I felt comfortable installing it rather than either of the other sets I had.  I know that this will last over time and if you don't do it right the first time, why bother?

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: brooke
Reviews.Content: don't buy anything that says used but approved working they are in it for the money and not for the customer. they should have tested it before posting it for sale...good luck on the next person that buys it. stay away from this.

Reviews.Title: Great cable for business use.
Reviews.Author: Superdesi
Reviews.Content: This is the best quality cable I've bought from amazon. Very nice thick shielding firmly attached and well built connectors. I installed this at a business and feel that they are reliable. All in all, I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good BNC cable + power
Reviews.Author: lost planet airman
Reviews.Content: This cable arived right on time just like Amazon said it would.  The shipping tracking system worked fine.  It came in a box much larger than the cable.  I needed a longer than 60' for a Q-See video surveilance installation.  Since the cable route was through a clustered crawl space with many 110vac lines about,a cable that is sturdier and shielded was chosen.  It worked fine the first time.  My order was placed with Amazon becuase Q-See was out of stock.  I read Amazon reviews and found out the cheaper Q-See cables that came with my system are only twisted pairs with no shielding.  They seem to be minimal,with fragile wire and ends, more like ear bud wire than video cable and I was afraid there would problems at the ends as I threaded them through the attic I was very gentle. They also worked fine.  I am happily surprised. LPA

Reviews.Title: Recieved wrong item and not the one as decribed
Reviews.Author: barry
Reviews.Content: Was not a 59u cable, the one that I got was same one you can buy at best buy for $14 dollars. Do not buy ...

Reviews.Title: Q-See QSVRG100 Shielded cable
Reviews.Author: Milt
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 of these to install security cameras.  Wanted to try these before buying enough to install 8 cameras.  They seem to be good quality.  Out of the box (sealed from Q-See),  one of the cables was clearly used.  Damage to one of the connectors and obvious dirt and abrasions from being pulled through walls and such.  I tested it and it works, but I will likely send it back as it is now suspect in my mind..  I will probably go ahead and order enough to do the rest, if the replacement arrives "new" as they are sold as.  If I end up with 8 and none of the others arrive used I will likely upgrade the 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement!
Reviews.Author: wazcpt
Reviews.Content: This is much heavier and UV resistant then the original cable that came with the system. Stands up to the punishment of the sun and filters any EM interferences.

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: Linde
Reviews.Content: Great product just what I needed along with my cameras and dvr to install my security system as soon as I can..

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cable to replace the originals that came with dvr & security cameras.  It's definitely worth the money, much heavier cable & picture quality is much better.

Reviews.Title: Idiot Quality Control
Reviews.Author: Ken D.
Reviews.Content: The cables of which I ordered TWO, were completely useless.The female power supply (Red) end that plugs into the power supply had had about 1/4 of an inch left exposed beyond the insulator and that metal was supposed to slip over the male post at the power supply.Not a problem leaving the metal tube exposed I suppose instead of covered by insulated as in the illustration of the product EXCEPT the metal tube's diameter was TOO SMALL to fit into the power supply, over each male post, making the entire cable useless.Debating whether to return and wait for another OR carefully altering the tube to "Make it fit".Dumb idiot quality control this SHOULD NEVER have happened.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality
Reviews.Author: pmich10
Reviews.Content: I had to run this wire an extra sixty feet but the extra length was helpful.  Great quality as it was easy to hide wires without breaking them.  The description said it came with two connectors but I was only able to find one.  That was OK as I only needed one connector.  Maybe it was somewhere in the box but could not locate it.  Overall, no loss of video quality and was as described.  Thanks!!

Reviews.Title: No Way ! Save Your $$
Reviews.Author: kmayfield454
Reviews.Content: Stick with the flimsy cables your camera came with,Same thing ! Yes,Always gentle,I know these things can fray / break .Also,in item description,says this BNC Cable IS  indeed"UL" Listed .It's Not ! Not As Far As I can tell !! Deceptive . Just spend the right money & go to a local electronics store,So you REALLY know what you're getting.All the 5* reviews Have to be company people !

Reviews.Title: This is the best...
Reviews.Author: D. Wasinger
Reviews.Content: Purchased 3 cables and all are excellent quality and are working great. Heavy cable and sturdy connectors. Don't mess with cheap imitations.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Bill H
Reviews.Content: Sometimes you get what you pay for and this product worked well.  It sent the signal 100 feet with no interference.  I would have preferred black but that is no big deal.

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: Bill Jaffe
Reviews.Content: Cable is thick and strong unlike regular Bnc wire. I ran 2 of these cables with no issues. The cameras look great, no beeping from my dvr, no interference, no loss of signal what so ever.

Reviews.Title: cable
Reviews.Author: alvin
Reviews.Content: i gave this four stars because overall its a good qaulity cable, very thick compared to with what comes with the camera package. but could be better if the connections would lock in place instead of backing out. can solve this w/tie-ties. the picture however is very clear .

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Scott Nelson
Reviews.Content: Product works great and the shielded cable keeps interference a non-issue. Separate power supply a definite when running long distances.

ProductInfo.Features:
Shielded 100 Ft. Video & Power BNC(M) - BNC(M) Cable
High Quality Connectors
Use Indoor or Outdoor - Can Be Installed In-Wall
RG-59U - UL Approved Cable
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QSVRG100 Shielded Video & Power 100 Feet BNC Male Cable with 2 Female Connectors
